WARREN_CLOUD_PLATFORM:
Warren Cloud Platform is a full self-service cloud computing platform for data centers and hosting providers. Functionally rich, technologically modern and architecturally reliable turnkey cloud commercialization solution delivered as a Service and driven by your success to compete in the evergrowing IaaS market.  
    
    Warren Cloud Platform is an alternative to Virtuozzo, VMware, Proxmox, OpenStack, WHMCS. 
    Warren is provided as a managed service. 
    Warren Cloud Platform is website available at https//warren.io. It is kept up and running updated with no downtime twice a month. 
    Warren runs on customers hardware and in customers data center or colocation space. 
    
    Here's a breakdown of Warren Cloud Platform's key features:

Core Cloud Services:

Virtualization: Support for all major OS including Windows.
Storage: Ceph-based block & object storage, live snapshots, easy backups.
Networking: Software-defined with network function virtualization.
High Availability: Zero-downtime VM migration, disaster recovery.
Management & Billing:

Full Control: Manage clients, billing, payments, credits, tax, discounts.
Support Tools: Impersonate users for first-level support.
Automation: Admin API for management tasks.
Marketing: Manage coupon codes.
Payment Integrations: Credit cards, digital wallets, invoicing.
Platform Advantages:

Ease of Use: Fast, intuitive single-page web interface.
Scalability: Designed for high availability, reliability, growth.
Observability: Prometheus-based monitoring, Grafana dashboard.
API-Driven: 100% functionality accessible via RESTful API.
Multi-Cluster: GALS-based architecture for seamless upgrades.
Customizable: Theming & multi-reseller options.
Turnkey: Installed and deployed by Warren team, fast time to market.
This list highlights the core capabilities of Warren Cloud Platform, showcasing its strength in delivering a comprehensive, user-friendly, and scalable cloud solution.
